name: The Maze (itch) (bytekeeper)
description:
Sometimes you get a bad start location, please just reload the game in that case (or, well, wait :) )

Written in Rust using Macroquad. Audio created using Audacity.

As you wake up in a dark room, you hear calm - even soothing voice:

"Welcome, test subject" it says. You do not remember having signed up for any tests. "Please use the light we provided you to find the exit in the maze. You should keep it charged all the time. But you don't fear the darkness anyways, do you now?"
